content: the latest pattern from our gnome collection is the wedding groom gnome pattern the free pattern will be available on our blog www passionatecrafter com this month this crochet wedding gnome pattern will make a unique wedding gift for you or your loved one if you want to add a touch of magic to your wedding decoration the groom s wedding gnome is the perfect choice you can pair the groom gnome with his soulmate- the june bride gnome you can find the pattern here 1 the pattern pdf contains 8 pages with clear instructions and photo tutorials to guide you through skill level- easy/ beginner crochet terms- us crochet terms 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/the-june-bride-wedding-gnome
